title: Kodaiyila Lyrics Cuckoo Song Lyrics
singerName: Kalyani Nair, Pradeep Kumar, Vaikom Vijayalakshmi
stanzas:
Song: Kodaiyila
Singer(s): Vaikom Vijayalakshmi, Kalyani Nair, Pradeep Kumar
Lyricist: Yuga Bharathi
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Movie: Cuckoo (2014)

Kodayila mazha pola, ennuyira nee irukka.
Vaadayilum analaaga, veruven un kooda.
Kalayilan gadhiraaga, kannaruge ne irukka
malai varum nilavaagi thoduven kaathoda.

Pona senmathula senja thavam idhuvo.
innum kodi senmam kooda varum uravo.(2)

Kaariyam nooru seidhu
mannil vazhvadhu peridhu illai.
undhan kaaladi thadam arindhu
sellum padhaigal mudivadhillai.

Aalayam thaedi sendru
siyyum poojaigal thaevaillai.
Undhan kai viral thodum pozhudhu
thunbam tholaivilum varudhadhillai.

Uruvedhu vadivedhuvo
konda uravugal unarndhu thoda.
iruledhu oliyedhuvo
rendu irudhayam kalandhuvida.

Maaridum yaavumendru sollum
vaarthaiyil nesamum illai.
Unmai kadhalai porutha mattil
endha maattramum nigalvadhillai.

Aasaigal theerumattum kollum
anbinil azhagu illai.
vendhu pogira velayilum
anbu thee endrum alivadhillai.

Uruvedhu vadivedhuvo
konda uravugal unarndhu thoda.
iruledhu oliyedhuvo
rendu irudhayam kalandhuvida.

Kodayila mazha pola, ennuyira nee irukka.
Vaadayilum analaaga, veruven un kooda.
Kalayilan gadhiraaga, kannaruge ne irukka
malai varum nilavaagi thoduven kaathoda.

Pona senmathula senja thavam idhuvo.
innum kodi senmam kooda varum uravo.(2)
